name: Modern battle 2
description:
DESCRIPTION
Modern battle 2 is one of 3d shooting games in a urban that is free-to-play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items. You can disable in-app purchasing by adjusting your device settings.This popular gun 3d game with pocket edition is offline. Bring you epic FPS game experience.

DANGEROUS MISSIONS
Try modern battle 2. Deathmatch & Deadly Games! It is a modern shooter game with arresting campaign in the dead city and survival arena. Lead your squad to victory through 70 unique missions in modern combat gun 3d games). Pick up your gun to shoot and strike enemies (a lot of enemies from cops and robbers to nurses and swat members!) and try best to survive! Download it and battle now!

SEE AND FEEL
The one of moblie strike 3d games with quality visual, and seffects: bullet holes & spark effect… Characters are designed with the high quality models. There have many guns and weapons such as Handgun (M1911), Shotgun (828U), SMG (MP5K), Sniper gun (AWM, M82A3), assault (AK47, M4A1), nerf guns, machine guns, minigun (M134), rocket launchers (RPG 7), armor and more!…with great voxel models! . Special, more attractive tasks! You must use all of your guns and weapons to fight against the strike force (robbers), to dead trigger and protect your city from killer clowns.
Rewards: Killing Reward, Headshot Reward, God Like Killer Reward… (easy coins earning!) Growth System: Level, Rank, Reward. Add armor, receive gift box or coins, win the skins and weapons.

EQUIP POWERFUL WEAPONS
You also can buy the bullets for your Handgun (M1911), Shotgun (828U), SMG (MP5K), Sniper gun (AWM, M82A3), assault (AK47, M4A1), nerf guns, machine guns, minigun (M134), rocket launchers (RPG 7) before starting each mission in modern strike

ASSEMBLE YOUR ELITE SQUAD - YOU'RE NOT ALONE!
Recruit and train soldiers and lead them to the battlefield! Squadmates are very useful in modern strike.
